title: hmm
content: What's a lefthand man do, anyway?  The term "righthand man," as I understood it, carried a gangster/mafia connotation, meaning that someone's righthand man was their primary goon, did their dirty-work, roughed people up who needed roughing.  :-)  So me being Mortimer's righthand man is me saying that I do his dirtywork (like giving that dastardly Billy Blaze swirlies!) ... what's a lefthand man do?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/posted-pics/XkyRauhKeenLogo.png[/img]

title: Re: hmm
content:
Being Keen's lefthand man, it'd probably mean good stuff. -Genius314
[url=http://planetck.spatang.com]PlanetCK[/url]

title: Re: hmm
content:
I do believe that the latin for left is sinister; I also believe that the left hand is associated with bad luck and faliure.

Ergo Keens left hand man would be someone sinister who makes sure that those who annoy him quickly become associated with bad luck.

[Maybe you should go for 'Keens left foot woman' [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lindsey.gif[/img] A proud member of the signature stealing society

title: hmm
content: Well, when the custom titles were first announced, the moderators suggested everybody use creatures from the Keen games.  I think Andy (adurdin) is still "Wormouth" because of that.  If you can't think of anything for a custom title, it's probably best to start there.  Pick a Keen monster you like, and use that for a while.

title: hehe
content: Well, be sure that "Shikadi Overlord" is really what you want--the admins have the power to potentially change a custom title any time they want--but it doesn't mean they will.  Take some time and think about what you want to have for a long, long time--possibly even forever.  Don't just blurt out a request for a title because you're eager.  :-)  You've already got "Keen's lefthand man."

title: not just yet
content: Not quite yet, Harvey... :-)  The rules are that you have to have been here for 6 months, and have at least 314 posts.  I'm not sure when you first showed up here, but I'd guess it was 3 months ago... so you've got a bit longer to wait.  Keep thinking of ideas, too!
